Package clients

Class Client

java.lang.Object
clients.Client
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer
Direct Known Subclasses:
LegalPerson, NaturalPerson
public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer
Clients implement the Observer interface and are the ones that take part in an Auction

  • Constructor Details

    • Client

      public Client()
      Default constructor that initialises the information field

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update​(Information info)
      Updates the client's information field. The information field is the way a broker communicates with his client. The client tells the broker his name and his current bid, and the broker informs him about the maximum bid or his commission.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Observer
      Parameters:
      info - the information object attributed to the client

    • getInfo

      public Information getInfo()
      Description copied from interface: Observer
      A getter for an observer's information, used by the subject to better perform in the auction process
      Specified by:
      getInfo in interface Observer
      Returns:
      the current information attached to this client

    • copyTo

      public <T extends Client> void copyTo​(T obj)
      Generic method for copying fields from a client object to one of its subclasses
      Type Parameters:
      T - generic type that can be NaturalPerson or LegalPerson
      Parameters:
      obj - the subclass object

    • bid

      public org.apache.commons.math3.util.Pair<java.lang.Double,​java.lang.Integer> bid()
      A method called by the broker, in which he asks the client to give his current bid. This bid is calculated based on the information communicated by the broker and is guaranteed to not exceed the maximum sum the client can afford
      Specified by:
      bid in interface Observer
      Returns:
      a pair consisting of the current bid made by the client and an integer value for the number of won auctions(used to differentiate between clients who bid the same sum

    • update

      public void update​(boolean winner)
      A method called by the broker in which the client is updated of the current status of the auction
      Specified by:
      update in interface Observer
      Parameters:
      winner - decides if the client is the winner of the auction or not

    • signUp

      public void signUp​(int id, double maxPrice) throws UnknownProductException, DuplicateRequestException, InvalidProductRequest
      The method used by the client to sign up for a product.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the product demanded by the client
      maxPrice - the maximum price the client is willing to offer
      Throws:
      UnknownProductException - if the product that the client wants is not existent in the auction houses
      DuplicateRequestException - if this client already demanded the same product
      InvalidProductRequest - if the client requests a product that costs more than he can offer

      public void setId​(int id)
      Sets the client's ID

      id - the id to be set
